### aqStats (GM-5000)

```{r}
if (exists("air_quality_data_ugm3")) {
  stats_gm <- air_quality_data_ugm3 %>%
    aqStats(type="Cidade", pollutant=c("SO2","NO2","O3","CO","PM2.5","PM10"))
  DT::datatable(stats_gm)
}
```
